sources.test.sh:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "=== Simple ROCshmem Test ==="

# Test compilation only
hipcc -c -fgpu-rdc -x hip simple_test.cc \
    -I${ROCM_PATH:-/opt/rocm}/include \
    -I${ROCSHMEM_INSTALL_DIR:-/opt/rocshmem}/include \
    -I${OMPI_INSTALL_DIR:-/opt/openmpi}/include \
    -o simple_test.o

echo "Compilation successful!"

# Test linking
hipcc -fgpu-rdc --hip-link simple_test.o -o simple_test \
    ${ROCSHMEM_INSTALL_DIR:-/opt/rocshmem}/lib/librocshmem.a \
    ${OMPI_INSTALL_DIR:-/opt/openmpi}/lib/libmpi.so \
    -L${ROCM_PATH:-/opt/rocm}/lib -lamdhip64 -lhsa-runtime64

echo "Linking successful!"

# Run the test
./simple_test

echo "ROCshmem test completed successfully!"
